jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)including features or qualities that are not appealing or attractive
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)毫不掩饰缺点地；毫无保留地

lj.lj_ly: Philip must learn to accept me, warts and all.
lj.lj_ls: 菲利普必须学会毫无保留地接受我。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 尽管有各种缺点与瑕疵

lj.lj_ly: We love and respect you for what you are, warts and all.
lj.lj_ls: 尽管你也有这样那样的缺点，我们仍然因为你的个性而爱你、尊敬你

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wearte, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wrat and German Warze

entry.def: A wart is a small lump which grows on your skin.

entry.tran: 不隐瞒缺点地;毫不遮丑地
entry.def: If you describe someone or accept them warts and all, you describe them or accept them as they are, including all their faults.

example.ex: Lyn loves him warts and all...
He gives us a portrait of the real Gandhi, warts and all...
example.tran: 他向我们描绘了真正的甘地，包括他的不足。

means.word_mean: 1. any small rounded protuberance (as on certain plants or animals)
2. (pathology) a firm abnormal elevated blemish on the skin; caused by a virus
